scripts.pod-install: cd ios; RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 bundle exec pod install
scripts.pod-install-prod: cd ios; PRODUCTION=1 RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 bundle exec pod install
scripts.pod-install-legacy: cd ios; bundle exec pod install
scripts.pod-install-legacy-prod: cd ios; PRODUCTION=1 bundle exec pod install
scripts.pod-install-jsc: cd ios; USE_HERMES=0 RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 bundle exec pod install
scripts.pod-install-jsc-prod: cd ios; USE_HERMES=0 PRODUCTION=1 RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 bundle exec pod install
scripts.pod-install-jsc-legacy: cd ios; USE_HERMES=0 bundle exec pod install
scripts.pod-install-jsc-legacy-prod: cd ios; USE_HERMES=0 PRODUCTION=1 bundle exec pod install
scripts.clean-ios: cd ios; rimraf Podfile.lock Pods build
